message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this fantastic product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $20,000.  I'm confident we can find a price that works for both of us.
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I appreciate you being willing to negotiate. My budget for this product is $15,000, so I'm going to offer that as my starting point. What do you think?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your budget, but $20,000 is already a very competitive price for this product considering its value. How about we meet in the middle at $17,500?

I understand you're looking for more, Alice, but $15,000 is really the most I can do.  I'm happy to close the deal right now at that price, but if you need more time to consider it, I'm open to continuing to negotiate.
Bob, I appreciate you working with me. To be honest, $15,000 is cutting it very close, but I'm willing to accept $16,500 if we can close the deal today.  This is my final offer.
Alice, I really appreciate your flexibility. I'm still firm on $15,000.  I'm ready to close the deal right now at that price, but if we can't reach an agreement, I'm going to go with John's offer.
